com.digitalglobe.platform2020.identity.configuration.collector

Class AnnotationBasedOpinionatedEndpointCollector<T extends Servlet,A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.digitalglobe.platform2020.identity.configuration.collector.ServletOpinionCollectorHelper<T>
      • com.digitalglobe.platform2020.identity.configuration.collector.AnnotationBasedOpinionatedEndpointCollector<T,A>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OpinionatedEndpointCollector, UnopinionatedEndpointCollector
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CXFEndpointCollector, SpringMVCEndpointCollector

    public abstract class AnnotationBasedOpinionatedEndpointCollector<T extends Servlet,A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>
extends ServletOpinionCollectorHelper<T>
implements OpinionatedEndpointCollector, UnopinionatedEndpointCollector
    Use this class to create an endpoint collector for a framework that denotes its endpoints using standard Java Annotations (like Jax-RS or Spring MVC). Subclasses should specify the framework servlet used to serve up these endpoints, as well as the annotation type that is used to denote endpoints.
    Author:
    Josh Ghiloni

      • collectEndpoints

        public final RequestMatcher collectEndpoints(AuthenticationType requestType)
                                      throws EndpointsNotInitializedException
        Collects all endpoints into a RequestMatcher. This class accomplishes this by finding all classes and methods in the classes based on the annotations it uses, then calculating the URIs and methods for each method.
        Specified by:
        collectEndpoints in interface OpinionatedEndpointCollector
        Parameters:
        requestType - The AuthenticationType of requests to collect, or null if no requests match this type
        Returns:
        a request matcher with all the URIs for that AuthenticationType
        Throws:
        EndpointsNotInitializedException - if the collector is not ready to collect endpoints yet
        See Also:
        OpinionatedEndpointCollector.collectEndpoints(AuthenticationType)

      • requestMappingsToStrings

        private java.util.Collection<RequestMatcher> requestMappingsToStrings(A classLevel,
                                                                      A methodLevel,
                                                                      java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Convert RequestMapping objects into string paths
        Parameters:
        classLevel - the parent requestmapping
        methodLevel - the endpoint requestmapping
        Returns:
        a set of strings. since a request mapping can have n different endpoints specified, a classLevel request mapping with n values and a methodLevel mapping with m values will return a collection of up to n * m values

      • getPatternString

        private java.lang.String getPatternString(java.lang.String prefix,
                                          java.lang.String pattern)
        Build a string with a prefix and pattern, converting all {placeholders} to * Example: prefix /services/api pattern /myitem/{id} becomes /services/api/myitem/*

      • getPrimaryAnnotation

        Convert a request type to a list of annotations that conflict with this type

      • collectUnopinionatedEndpoints

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> collectUnopinionatedEndpoints()
                                                                     throws EndpointsNotInitializedException
        Description copied from interface: UnopinionatedEndpointCollector
        Collect all endpoints that have no opinions. These endpoints may have wildcards. Ideally, this should return a value such that org.springframework.util.CollectionUtils#isEmpty(java.util.Collection) returns true. If not, your microservice will fail to start.
        Specified by:
        collectUnopinionatedEndpoints in interface UnopinionatedEndpointCollector
        Returns:
        a collection of objects representing a list of unopinionated endpoints.
        Throws:
        EndpointsNotInitializedException - if the collector is not ready to collect endpoints yet
        See Also:
        UnopinionatedEndpointCollector.collectUnopinionatedEndpoints()

      • getHttpMethodsForJavaMethod

        protected java.lang.String[] getHttpMethodsForJavaMethod(A methodAnnotation,
                                                         java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Return an array of HTTP Methods that the requested Java method responds to.
        Parameters:
        methodAnnotation - The "mapping" annotation for this method
        method - the endpoint method being inspected
        Returns:
        an array of HTTP Methods (return null to allow all)

      • verifyReady

        protected abstract void verifyReady()
                             throws EndpointsNotInitializedException
        Make sure the framework is ready to be collected.
        Throws:
        EndpointsNotInitializedException - if the endpoints for this framework are not yet initialized (for example, if this is called before the ApplicationContext is fully refreshed)

      • collectEndpointClasses

        protected abstract java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<?>> collectEndpointClasses()
        Returns:
        A collection of Classes that represent a set of endpoints

      • convertAnnotationToEndpoints

        protected abstract java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> convertAnnotationToEndpoints(A annotation)
        Return all endpoints that a given annotation instance represents.
        Parameters:
        annotation - the mapping annotation for a given class/method
        Returns:
        all paths that this annotation represents
